title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.6 - Workers' compensation board subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.6 - Workers' compensation board subject matter list

State Regulations

The Workers' Compensation Board shall maintain a subject
matter list of records required to be disclosed by article 6 of the Public

Officers Law and such subject matter list, updated every six months, shall be
located in the Office of the General Counsel of the Workers' Compensation

Board, 180 Livingston Street, Brooklyn, NY 11248 and in the office of the

Assistant Executive Director for Administration of the Workers' Compensation

Board, 100 Broadway-- Menands, Albany, NY 12241, in a place available for
public inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
425.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
